name: All Nighter Waterproof Makeup Setting Spray
about: What it is: Award-winning setting spray with a natural finish that makes makeup fresh & transfer resistant. Lasts up to 16 hours. This fixing spray is waterproof...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.Temperature control technology: Time-release molecules that burst gradually to lower the temperature of your skin...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens and mineral oil. It is also vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This smudge-proof and waterproof setting spray locks in makeup while keeping it from settling into fine lines. With a super-fine mist, the long-lasting setting spray, with temperature control technology, helps keep skin cool (even oily skin) and prevents makeup meltdowns for long-lasting wear...Clinical Results: In a 7-day study with 50 people:.- 78% of participants said it helped their makeup last for up to 16 hours.- Over 80% said their makeup not only looked better, it stayed on better (even in the T-zone) without settling into fine lines.- Whether they had combination, dry, or oily skin, 88% or more said it was the best product to help their makeup last
ingredients: - Temperature control technology: Time-release molecules that burst gradually to lower the temperature of your skin....Aqua/Water/Eau, Alcohol Denat., PVP, Dimethicone PEG-7 Phosphate, PPG-3 Benzyl Ether Myristate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Dipropylene Glycol, Isononyl Isononanoate, Ethylhexyl Isononanoate, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Cocamidopropyl PG-Dimonium Chloride Phosphate, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Glycereth-5 Lactate, Phenylpropanol, Propanediol, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Sodium Hydroxide, Parfum/Fragrance, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Maltodextrin, Poloxamer 407, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After completing your makeup look, shake the bottle well..-Hold the bottle eight to 10 inches away from your face and mist two to four times in an X and T formation....Beauty tip:.-Want extra-intense, long-lasting eye color with less fallout? Wet your eyeshadow brush with All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray before you apply.

Okay, so keeping my makeup looking fresh all day has always been a bit of a challenge, but the All Nighter Waterproof Makeup Setting Spray is a total game-changer!  First of all, the bottle is super sleek and the spray comes out in this fine, even mist that covers your face perfectly without soaking it. Just a couple of spritzes and you're set.  The best part? It's super lightweight and doesn't feel sticky at all. It's like you're not even wearing anything, but it keeps your makeup locked in place all day. Whether I'm at work, hitting the gym, or out and about on a humid day, this setting spray keeps everything looking flawless from morning to night.  If you're looking for a reliable setting spray that actually works, give All Nighter a tryu2014you won't regret it!

reviews.review_title: Works really well in hot humid weather!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a longtime user of Urban Decay products, especially their makeup palettes and shadow primer, I had high expectations for their All Nighter Waterproof Makeup Setting Spray. All in all, I'd say that this product performed amazingly, I just had a few minor things I think could be improved.  First and foremost, this product claims to be waterproof. I put this setting spray to the test during a particularly humid day and my makeup remained flawless throughout. Whether you're dancing the night away or caught in unexpected weather, this spray locks in your look without budging. The application is really simple and the spray nozzle produces a nice fine mist that covers your face in a thin layer. Definitely don't forget to shake it first and don't spray too close to your face. It doesn't leave any sticky residue and dries down quite quickly. I think this is the purpose of the alcohol denat. in the ingredient list, but I do wish this extremely drying ingredient wasn't in there as it's not great for dry skin. It also contains fragrance, which isn't great for sensitive skin either. However, I do really like that the formula is vegan and free of parabens and sulfates.  Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

I wore this for the Chris Brown concert in Toronto last week and through sweat and tears from the excitement of the show, my makeup did not move one bit. I love that the nozzle is perfect and that it doesn't feel like I just sprayed a film onto my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray  Thank you to @thisisbutterly and @urbandecay for sending me this mini setting spray for free in exchange for my honest review.  This has a cult following for a REASON. I've used this for years and even when I try something new, I still find my way back home to it. This is the only setting spray I truly trust for ultra hold in the sweltering heat (I do appreciate and love summer weddings but man, I get sweaty watching nuptials out in the sun!) and I feel like I'm less likely to need a touch up when I use this spray. If you're looking for a dewy or matte finish, this may not be your best option but I feel like this gives a neutral finish which is so versatile. Glowy base? This isn't messing around with it. Matte to the nines? No problem, we're just setting and forgetting. Even if I venture out to try something new (in the name of testing!), I will always find my way back home to this waterproof setting spray.

reviews.review_text: Were you a victim of 2015 makeup trends? I sure was.  If you were too then you likely used Urban Decay! What I like to do to get the maximum amount of long lasting coverage, is once I am finished my face makeup, like foundation and bronzer, I will spray in a circular motion around my face. Fan myself to let the setting spray dry, and continue on with the rest of my makeup. Once I am done with the rest of my makeup, do a final layer of setting spray, let dry and good to go!  It really is amazing how well this stuff works, it really does give you coverage that lasts hours. I am not sure if I would say it lasts 16 hours like it advertises, perhaps if you were not sweating or touching your face, but the average person does, and I know I am guilty for it too.  The biggest thing I do not like about this setting spray though that no one talks about is the smell. I just don't like it, but I tolerate it because it works so well!

reviews.review_text: The All Nighter Waterproof Makeup Setting Spray is a game-changer for long-lasting makeup. It keeps makeup intact for hours, even in humid conditions and light rain. reviews.review_text: I was looking forward to putting this setting spray from @urbandecaycosmetics to the test for free in exchange for my honest review #gotitfree! I noticed that this setting spray did especially well locking in the powder products. With the creamier products, this setting spray really needs to dry down to get the best staying power. Overall, I would rate this setting spray an 9/10 since it keeps the products vibrant and extends the longevity of the makeup really well! reviews.review_title: Truly an all nighter setting spray
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the All Nighter Waterproof Makeup Setting Spray, it exceeded my expectations. This product truly lives up to its reputation for keeping makeup in place all day long.  One of the standout features for me was how light it felt upon application. Unlike some other setting sprays that can feel heavy or sticky, the All Nighter spray goes on with a fine mist that feels weightless on the skin. It's almost like you're not wearing any setting spray at all!  In terms of performance, this spray really delivers. My makeup stayed flawless from  morning until night, without any smudging or fading. I was in NYC the week I tried this, and even in the humid conditions, the All Nighter spray held up remarkably well, keeping my makeup looking fresh and vibrant.

reviews.review_text: I got caught in a torrential downpour, and my makeup didn't move! I've also used this setting spray on hot, humid summer days, in Disney World, and on our cruises.   Trust me when I say, run, don't walk, to grab Urban Decay's All Nighter Waterproof Makeup Setting Spray. It keeps your makeup from melting off your face. It's become a must- have product for me.

This isn't my first time trying this award winning setting spray. It definitely lives up to the hype that's surrounded this setting spray for years. It has a very fine mist that never disrupts makeup and always gives the perfect finish, not too matte nor too dewy. It also smells amazing, I love the sweet fresh scent. It's been a multi time repurchase for me, so you know it's good when they have you coming back for more.   It keeps makeup indeed intact all day long. It's perfect for summertime and keeping your makeup sweat proof. If you want to wear makeup to the beach or the pool this setting spray will be your best friend.   Definitely recommend it, if you haven't tried it and are looking for a setting spray that actually does what's it's supposed to do- this is it.   - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_text: Would 100% recommend! I have very sensitive and oily skin, so a lot of setting sprays have made me break out. This is the only setting spray that has not affected my skin. And it keeps my makeup on all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: She's a legend, believe the hype.   Urban Decay's All Nighter Makeup Setting Spray boasts 16 hours of makeup staying power. I put this product to the test on the hottest, most humid day we have had here so far this year...and was left very impressed. I also used this over my daughter's prom makeup, which lasted from morning to night..through humidity, dancing and sweat!  This spray really does prolong the wear of your makeup. I applied it in both a T and X motion on my face as per the directions. This setting spray is lightweight and comfortable on the skin. It dries quickly and doesn't leave you feeling sticky or tacky. The nozzle on the bottle is great and makes application easy. It comes out in a fine mist, so the product is pretty evenly distributed. Its alcohol free and doesn't dry out your skin.   A few sprays of this setting spray and my makeup stayed allll day, even in the awful humidity. I have a terrible habit of touching my eyes, so my eye makeup never lasts. When using this setting spray my eye makeup didn't smudge and lasted all day. There was no noticeable fading or settling into my fine lines.   My only suggestion is to spray before mascara or to make sure your mascara is dry before applying.   After multiple uses I can see why so many people love this product. Its perfect for special occasions or humid weather. It really keeps your makeup looking fresh so you dont need to have frequent touchups.    I will definitely be buying this in the future  - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

My makeup didn't transfer or smudge. It is an absolute game changer and a must have for these summer days!  Such a refreshing spray that does an awesome job at keeping my makeup intact for the day!   - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

I tested this makeup setting spray for a few weeks and I must say it is amazing! It doesn't let my makeup move. I have dry skin and usually setting sprays make it more dry, but this one does not make it patchy or anything. Love it!!

must say, it has exceeded my expectations. I even wore it to a pool party. Amazingly, my makeup stayed intact the entire time! Despite the humidity and the potential for splashes, my makeup did not budge or smudge at all. It Telt comtortable on my skin, and I barely noticed I was wearing it. It kept my makeup looking flawless all day long.

The fact that I can feel it certainly helps my awareness as to whether I've covered all areas of my face. And well, I'm not sure anyone likes being hosed down haha.  This little travel size is very compact and would be great for travelling or being carried in a purse for touchups. reviews.review_title: Such a glowy and long lasting finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with dry skin, I often struggle to find a setting spray that can keep my makeup looking fresh all day without causing my skin to either dry out even more or get too oily. This setting spray strikes the perfect balance. The fine mist is incredibly lightweight and doesn't feel heavy on my skin. After applying my makeup, just a few spritzes are enough to lock everything in place. I've noticed a significant difference in the longevity of my makeup; it stays flawless and vibrant from morning until night.   One of my favorite things about this spray is that it doesn't leave any sticky residue. My skin feels soft and breathable, and there's a natural, dewy finish that adds a beautiful glow. Plus, it has a pleasant, subtle fragrance that isn't overpowering. It made my makeup completely  smudge proof but just make sure to drench your skin with the spray. It definitely works.

reviews.review_title: Used it for my graduation! Makeup didn't budge ud83dude0d
reviews.review_text: I recently used Urban Decay's All Nighter Setting Spray for my graduation, and it was a lifesaver! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first saw this setting spray by Urban Decay when I checked out their website to get the details on their Face Bond Foundation that I tested recently and it sounded so good. I wanted to try it and voila.  My impression: I gave this setting spray a good test drive, and it passed with flying colors. I wore it on a hot day, went for a walk, did some shopping, threw water on my face, and my makeup stayed put. ud83cudf21  I used it again for a night out into the early hours, again tossing water on my face and my makeup stayed in place. It was non-drying and gave my skin a bit of a glow.   The only part of my makeup that didn't last was my lip gloss, I had a feeling it was asking too much, so I still needed to reapply after an hour or so.   It actually takes a little extra effort to wash off, instead of a double cleanse a triple may be needed. This will be my go-to setting spray; they do have a few different finishes to choose from and the one that I tried is the real skin finish. There is a dewy glow finish and I think I'll go for that next because I'm addicted to more glow.  Got it free from this is butterly and urban decay in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lives up to its name! I was very excited to get the opportunity to test out the claims knowing my brother's wedding was approaching - an event that would have me laughing, crying, and managing multiple temperature extremes from sweating it up on the dance floor to freezing (literally) my face off with ice packs after hitting it force into a pillar. She is beauty, but she never ever claimed to be grace.   I managed to make it through the night, even though the testing for the All Nighter was extended beyond what was planned. The setting spray not only met but exceeded my expectations. After a long night and even after getting a concussion, my makeup stayed exactly where I had carefully applied it 12 hours earlier. There was no transfer onto the pillar either (yes, I checked!).  The spray itself is a dream. It is lightweight, quick-drying, and comfortable, perfect for my sensitive skin. The mist is fine and even, effortlessly locking in my makeup without altering its finish. Despite dancing and stressing about the injury, the only glow I had was the one I applied on purpose. The spray made sure any additional oil or shine was kept under control, while my highlighter stayed in place.   Having used setting sprays before, I understand the struggle of finding one that's truly worth the extra step. All Nighter has proven to me that its five-star reputation is well-deserved, especially for events where long-lasting makeup is a must. I was able to forget about my makeup with a few quick spritzes, and it was nice to have one less thing to worry about on such a big day. Of course, reapplication of gloss was required throughout the night, and because it worked so well, removing my makeup at the end of the night was more involved, but I think that is worth the tradeoff.   - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

I like to use a setting spray for long wear occasions like weddings, dance competitions or travel days when I want to ensure my makeup does not smudge or rub off. I used this for doing my own wedding makeup and it worked great, no transfer or smudging.   I do not notice a scent and the mist is fine enough that you don't get large drops on your face.   I do find this can be a tiny bit drying when layered over setting powder but is still the most effective choice when you really don't want your makeup to move and it is always my go to choice for special occasions. I received this product free for review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This microfine mist goes on evenly and feels completely weightless on the skin. This setting spray is so amazing that it keeps my makeup looking fresh for up to 16 hours without smudging, fading, setting into fine lines and is transfer proof (this is huge for me)! This stuff is so good that it is designed for all skin types leaving you with a matte finish. Best of all, it is also waterproof!  I've never heard of temperature-controlled technology for makeup but this setting spray will actually lower makeup's temperature to lock your look into place!   After spraying my face down with this, my makeup actually looked even more vibrant. I am obsessed with this setting spray! I can literally get ready for my day, go work a 10.5-hour shift and still look as flawless as when I left the house.  Run, don't walk to get this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Urban Decay All-Nighter Makeup Setting Spray, and it's a game-changer for my combination skin. Typically, my blush and bronzer wear off by the end of the day, but with this setting spray, my makeup stayed fresh and vibrant from 11:30 am until 9 pm. Even on hot sunny days, my makeup didn't smudge or melt. The spray is lightweight and incredibly gentle on the skin, making it comfortable to wear all day.  What I love most is its transfer resistance and natural finish. It doesn't feel heavy or sticky, and it prevents my skin from getting oily or shiny by the end of the day. The scent is delicate and pleasant, not overpowering at all.   I highly recommend this product, even if you don't wear intense glam makeup daily. It's a must-have for special occasions when you need your makeup to last. This setting spray lives up to its promises and keeps your makeup flawless all day!  * Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you're like me and don't want your makeup to budge, it's the Urban Decay All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray to the rescue. This product is one of the best for anyone who wants her makeup to stay flawless all day and night.  The spray is incredibly easy to use. The fine mist covers the face and neck evenly without feeling heavy or sticky. With how lightweight it feels, it's almost like you're not wearing anything at all.  What truly sets this setting spray apart is its staying power. The setting spray has makeup staying perfectly in place from morning until late at night. I didn't need any touchups, even on a particularly hot and humid day. Its patented technology is supposed to lower the temperature of makeup, and there is something to that as both cream-, powder-, and oil-based products stayed put.  Another thing I love about this product is that it doesn't dry out my skin. The Urban Decay formula kept my skin feeling hydrated and fresh. Plus, it didn't cause any breakouts, which is always a plus for me.  The All Nighter Long-Lasting Setting Spray has a subtle scent that isn't overpowering, and the bottle comes with a double cap to prevent any leaks or messes. Plus, its vegan and cruelty-free formula ensures it doesn't exclude any makeup lovers from having a fresh face that stays put until you're ready to remove it.  [Product received complimentary for testing purposes.]

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Urban Decay All Nighter Makeup Setting Spray for several months now, and it has become an indispensable part of my makeup routine. Here's why it stands out to me:  This setting spray truly lives up to its name. Whether I'm attending a full day of work, running errands, or enjoying a night out, my makeup stays put from morning to night. I've tested it in various conditions, including humid and hot weather, and my makeup remained intact without any significant smudging or fading.  One of my favorite aspects of the All Nighter Spray is the finish it gives my skin. After applying, it leaves my face looking fresh and slightly dewy without being shiny. It seamlessly blends my makeup, eliminating any powdery residue and giving my skin a natural, flawless look.  The spray feels lightweight and breathable on my skin. It doesn't leave any sticky or greasy residue, and it doesn't clog my pores, which is a significant plus for someone with combination skin like mine. I also appreciate that it's oil-free and doesn't contribute to breakouts.  The spray nozzle dispenses a fine, even mist that covers my face in just a few pumps. I typically hold the bottle about 8-10 inches away from my face and apply in an u201cXu201d and u201cTu201d motion for full coverage. The product dries quickly, allowing me to go about my day without any delay.  A little goes a long way with this spray. Even with regular use, one bottle lasts me several months, making it a cost-effective addition to my makeup collection.  The scent is subtle and pleasant. It's not overpowering and dissipates quickly after application, which is great for those sensitive to strong fragrances.  Overall, the Urban Decay All Nighter Makeup Setting Spray has exceeded my expectations. It's a reliable product that ensures my makeup stays flawless for hours, providing confidence that my look will last as long as I need it to. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a trustworthy setting spray that delivers on its promises.

reviews.review_title: Great for wen you don't want your makeup to move
reviews.review_text: Now to give this product a good try I thought it best to try this out on a hot, humid day with a full face of makeup featuring my favourite Urban Decay Eyeshadow Palette the Robin Eisenberg Naked palette. I used a mix of mattes, shimmers, and glittery shades from the palette along with a matte foundation, a cream concealer, a tubing mascara and a liquid Blush/lip colour in order to really test out this setting spray. The only product I used with this setting spray that did not work well was the mascara and I would say that makes sense as liquid is supposed to dissolve the mascara. Everything else I used set amazingly well! Not only was the day I chose to really test out this spray was not just hot and humid but the rain came down in sheets and my makeup did not move! I have always loved Urban Decay' products and this one is no different!   - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great setting spray. It has a wonderfully fine mist that I adore. It is great for getting rid of that powder finish on your face after you set it with powder. It claims to extend the life of your makeup, make it smudge-proof and transfer resistant, but I had that happen every single time. Don't get me wrong, it reduces the smudge and transfer, but the smudging and the smearing still happen. I feel the best way to use this is to set the makeup with powder and then remove the powder look with the spray.  It is a great spray, but I honestly nothing is going to fully do what they claim.   - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been on the hunt for a setting spray that actually keeps my makeup looking fresh all day, and Urban Decay's All Nighter Long-Lasting Makeup Setting Spray is a game-changer.  The texture is super light and fine, drying quickly without feeling heavy or sticky. The ingredients, including temperature control technology, really help keep makeup looking cool and fresh.   One downside is the smell u2013 it's kind of nasty, probably because of the alcohol, but it fades quickly. Despite this, the spray feels like nothing on my skin, with no tacky residue.  Longevity is where this spray shines. I wore my makeup for about 10 hours, and it still looked fresh. Urban Decay claims it lasts up to 16 hours without fading, cracking, smudging, or setting into fine lines, and I can see why.  The packaging is sleek and sturdy, with a matte black bottle, lavender writing, and a purple mister. However, my mister spewed large drops instead of a fine mist, which might be a one-off issue.  I don't wear super heavy makeup u2013 just BB cream or skin tint, blush, lipstick, but always eyeliner. This setting spray keeps everything in place perfectly for my routine.  As for the price, it's on the higher end, but considering how well it performs, I think it's worth if you want to invest in a good setting mist.   Overall, Urban Decay's All Nighter Setting Spray is a must-have. Despite the smell and my iffy mister, it's lightweight, long-lasting, and makeup looking fresh.   I got this product for free from @butterly and @urbandecaycosmetics for my honest review.

I loved feeling that my makeup was protected for hours, it did indeed look spectacular despite being in the sun and going to the pool. My pores looked much better and the foundation lasted all day.  - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A waterproof, long lasting setting spray that can lock in your makeup for up to 16 hours of wear is definitely a must have for those u201call nighteru201ds. The formula is made with a temperature control technology that allows your makeup to keep cool while also contributing to both a smudge and transfer resistant product. The mist is fine and lightweight - leaving my skin feeling refreshed and energized. I like that it is breathable and does leave a heavy feel or shiny look on my skin. Due to my oily combination skin, I did find some dry patches at the end of the night however.   - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this setting spray by Urban Decay for as long as I can remember . I have tried going astray a few times , but always would end up back here because others are not as good. Truly, the name lives up to the hype. It is called all nighter for a reason and it is honestly one of the only sprays that I find works and holds things where it should. I typically go for bold eye looks, and set my entire face with this spray. I also like using this to mix with powders to create my own long lasting liner. The photo I have attached is at the end of the day, in 30 degree weather . This spray just simply works, I love the cooling fine mist, the spray nozzle doesn't ever get clogged up and it delivers it until the last drop. The best setting spray on the market.   - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the All Nighter Waterproof Makeup Setting Spray, which I received for free, and used it for about a week during a recent heat wave. This transfer-resistant and waterproof spray truly passed the test, keeping my makeup intact all day. The super-fine mist was refreshing and prevented my makeup from settling into fine lines. With its temperature control technology, my skin stayed cool, and my makeup remained smudge-proof for all day long. I also appreciate that it's free of parabens and mineral oil, and that it's vegan and cruelty-free.   - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Trying the @urban decay All Nighter Setting Spray was quite a roller coaster! I had heard so many great things about it that my expectations were sky-high. Sadly, it didn't quite hit the mark for me. The second cap felt completely unnecessary, and the scent was a bit too chemical for my liking. The biggest disappointment? It smudged my makeup, which is the opposite of what it's supposed to do.   There's definitely room for improvement here, especially considering I've used other setting sprays that perform better and are more affordable. I usually love Urban Decay products, but this one just didn't work for me.  - Product received for free from Urban Decay Canada in exchange for an honest review.
